about_the_game:
In this age of a global viral outbreak, you are the next generation human of the “Alpha” Project, the hope for humanity's future. You are deployed to the frontlines of the zombie tide to reignite the hope of human survival.

No lengthy storylines, no repetitive cutscenes. Step into this adventurous post-apocalyptic world. Choose your favorite character and pick up your preferred weapon! This is a game everyone will enjoy. Whether you're experienced or new to gaming, simply move, choose, and decide to experience the recurring joy of survival.

You are a lone hero, equipped with various talents and support skills. You can either focus on your favorite character to change their gear and unlock their ultimate abilities. How you combine your equipment and find your own preferred playstyle will be the challenge this post-apocalyptic world presents to everyone.

He is a stoic warrior. He specializes in using katanas, pistols, and assault rifles. By traveling through a rift in time and space, he has gained dark powers, allowing him to wield unique moves with his katana.

He is a wild warrior.and the grenade launcher is his favorite. Only he can use this heavy weapon, and his physical enhancement allows him to fire it in rapid succession.

She is agile and quick, excelling at launching surprise attacks. Proficient with daggers and automatic rapid-fire pistols, she is a highly-trained assassin whose specialty is throwing all kinds of throwing knives.

She is exceptionally talented, possessing strength and a desire for conquest that surpasses that of men. She specializes in using revolvers and sniper rifles. Additionally, she knows how to use two revolvers simultaneously, and after her body is enhanced, she can fire a rapid round at all surrounding enemies at once.

As a small team of close friends, we create the kind of games we love to play and hope to share them with you. If you have any thoughts on the direction of our game design, we look forward to your feedback on our forums or via email. If you’re interested in this game, please add it to your wishlist—it means a lot to us!

content_descriptors.notes: The main objective of the game is to kill zombies, complete the storyline, and rescue survivors. The zombies will have graphic depictions of heavy bleeding and limb dismemberment.

No lengthy storylines, no repetitive cutscenes. Step into this adventurous post-apocalyptic world. Choose your favorite character and pick up your preferred weapon! name: Apocalypse Survivors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2060
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 / AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 3060
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: As the savior of the apocalypse, take up your weapons and unleash your powers. Rescue survivors, confront waves of zombies, and through relentless searching, become an immortal warrior. Write your own glorious legend in this plague-ridden hell.
